idea-plugin.name: IDEA EBook
idea-plugin.description:
IDEA EBool可以用来读书，可以使您的IntelliJ IDEA更有趣，您会发现Intellij IDEA甚至可以编写代码 IDEA EBool can be used to read books, can make your IntelliJ IDEA more interesting, you will find that IntelliJ IDEA can even write code
English:
E-book reading plug-in developed based on IntelliJ IDEA
Support search, latest chapter query, designated chapter jump, author information, update time query 中文： 基于IntelliJ IDEA开发的电子书阅读插件
支持搜索，最新章节查询，指定章节跳转，作者信息，更新时间查询
